A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'll defined characters muddle their way through a logic-free plot\, portrayed in incomprehensible visuals. Yes\, the movie even fails visually. For example\, a shot near the beginning shows Poe and his X-Wing taking up more space in frame than the Super Mega Ultra Star Destroyer he is opposing\, while the movie itself is attempting to portray him as David to the bad guys' Goliath.
